title: I recived a low priority qeueu while reconnecting
body: I had an issue with my internet router while connecting to the game it then forced me to DC, while connecting i was thrown out of the load screen and given a low priority queue, i don't understand why i should be punished for leaving a game i was coming back into!?

replies.body:
You won't get an LPQ for just one leave, so this was probably a culmination of recent afk's. You might not be able to fully control your internet, but ultimately leaving the game for any reason is still leaving your teammates hanging. 

If possible, I'd be sure to switch to a wired connection for more stability, but it'd also be a good step to [**adjust your DNS settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq5) and testing some other troubleshooting in a custom/practice game.
